original_text: But Amnon refused to listen to her. He was stronger than she was. So he took hold of her and he had sex with her.
korean_text: 암논이 그 말을 듣지 아니하고 다말보다 힘이 세므로 억지로 그와 동침하니라

sentences.original_text: But Amnon refused to listen to her.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 암논은 그녀의 말을 듣기를 거절했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was stronger than she was.
So he took hold of her
and he had sex with her.
